features: This Women's Wash is a gentle foaming cleanser made to help you keep your privates clean, soft, and smooth. It helps to maintain vaginal and urinary tract health while supporting normal vaginal pH levels.

How it Works: Vaginesse Foaming Cleanser wash helps to maintain a balanced vaginal pH and healthy levels of vaginal microbes. This unique product helps to support 3 key areas: reproductive health organs, the gut, and the immune system.
Clean Ingredients: This supplement is paraben-free, GMO-free and Vegan.
Pleasant/More Ingredients: This foaming cleanser contains ingredients like water, Aloe, lavender, vitamin-c, coconut extracts, lemon grass, OPA(organic plants acids) life.

Less Stress More Finesse: At Vaginese, we create natural solutions for natural problems because we experience them too (Yes, really!). Discover clean, products that fit your body's needs and remember, you're never alone here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to meet carry-on specs. A little on the expensive side for bottle size but it was worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't take the risk of using this when it arrived because it said it was best before 12/22 and it was already December when it came. I didn't care for the scent of this either, almost like a bad candle so I refrained from trying this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This foam cleanser work well and does not irritate my skin. It doesn’t have a strong scent and it lasts for a few uses. Great cleansing wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but could do without the scent.
reviews.reviewText: This review is for: Foaming Cleanser Wash for Women - pH balanced 50ml/ 1.7 fl oz- Supports Vaginal Health & Maintains Vaginal Flora- Vegan Paraben-free - Feminine Health Foaming CleanserThis is a small bottle, but you don't use a lot each time as it's a foam.I like that the ingredient list is short. I only wish they had done without the fragrance. I don't need fragrance down there. Just want pure, simple ingredients and a very basic cleanliness.I appreciate that it's cruelty-free.I feel like the price of roughly $10 isn't too bad for this.It seems to work pretty well. A little goes a long way.I hope this was helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective A+
reviews.reviewText: I've always used traditional soap and never thought there would be a difference, but believe me, there is. The cleanser makes me feel good down there, and the aloe has a smooth feel. Also, the lavender and lemongrass aroma gives it that extra oomph. I will be using this cleaner from now on, and you should too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not bad, but I have used better. The scent is like citronella, which I don't love. Don't worry, the scent only lasts a few seconds when you pump it out of the bottle. The "foam" is a little watery in my opinion. Does not irritate and good to stay fresh and clean. I like that this is vegan and cruelty-free, so that is a bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not impressed, was hoping for more
reviews.reviewText: So, the bottle I received of this has an expiration date of 12/22. I know that's probably not even a big worry for most people, but this is being used on my lady bits and having something that could have already been expired is a flag on my radar. I have very sensitive skin down there, like extremely sensitive. But I wanted to give it a fair chance so I tried it out every single day for over a week now.There is no scent in this. Which is awesome for me, Ms Sensitivity and all. The pump is easy to use, but only disperses little at a time. I haven't noticed a difference of anything down there, so this isn't working out for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: This women's foaming cleanser is so gentle, and unlike regular soap, it really leaves me feeling clean.I could not be happier.Note please that a tiny amount of it will make lots of cleansing foam, so use sparingly!
